name: Stellar Express: the last stop
description:
In Stellar Express: the last stop you will make your way through an environment that is in danger of getting taken over by bandits. Facing this danger, our main characters Caine and Valerie start looking for artifacts that will assist them in battling the bandits. 

In this demo you will have the ability to experience the first two rooms in our game. You will be able to collect items, talk to NPC's and enter battles.
